titleStmt.title: The tryall of trauell, or, [brace] 1. The wonders in trauell, 2. The worthes of trauell, 3. The way to trauell in three bookes epitemizd / by Baptist Goodall, merchant.
titleStmt.author: Goodall, Baptist.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Norton, and are to bee sould by Iames Vpton, at his shop in Paules Church yeard at the signe of the Fox,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages cropped and print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
